ignorePatterns.___comment___: gnu.org often returns 0, causing failed CI/CD checks
cloudflare *always* returns 403, probably because of their DDoS protection
ignoring URLs with %23 as it leads to false positives. see https://github.com/tcort/markdown-link-check/issues/264

headers.Accept-Encoding: zstd;q=1, br;q=0.9, gzip;q=0.8, deflate;q=0.7, compress;q=0.6, *;q=0.1, identity;q=0
